casebody.data:
Hiram Arnold v. Nelson B. Nye and others. Affidavits must be entitled •with the names of all the parties to the suit, Heard and decided July 14th. Motion to dismiss a writ of error. Affidavits being offered in support of the motion, H. J. Beakes, for plaintiff in error,

objected that some of the affidavits were entitled Hiram Arnold v. Nelson B. Nye, et al.; .and he claimed that, while such entitling might be sufficient in a notice, all the names of the parties must be given in the entitling of affidavits, or they were mere nullities.

T. M. Cooley, contra.

The Court held that the affidavits objected to could not be read.
